issue.title: [Packaging] Expand build matrices to multiple tasks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2836](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2836). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create release tags for each task instead a single one for the job, and create additional tasks per build variant. 
This will resolve the package naming conflicts, but increases the config verbosity (which is fine for now).
